igpp.tools

Class Scan

  • java.lang.Object
    • igpp.tools.Scan

  • public class Scan
extends Object
    Tool to determine the maximum and minimum attributes for files in a branch of a file system.
    Author:
    Todd King

      • scan

        public long[] scan(String path)
            throws Exception
        Scan a path and count the number of files and total bytes occupied.
        Parameters:
        path - the file system path to scan for files.
        Returns:
        array containing file count and byte count.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any error occurs.
